name: fanfare
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a loud, short piece of music played on brass instruments, often to announce something important
[ U ] great attention to and interest in something: much fanfare The new laws were passed after much fanfare.little fanfare Riordan and his staff receive little fanfare for their work.

Excitement, interest, energy and enthusiasm
Add to word list
Add to word list
showy activity meant to draw attention to something: Earth Day was observed without a great deal of fanfare this week.
